# Bug Report

## Description
A clear and concise description of the bug.

1. Step one
2. Step two
3. Step three

## Expected Behavior
What you expected to happen.

## Actual Behavior
What actually happened.

## Additional Context
Add any other context about the problem here, such as screenshots, logs, etc.
